item.title: [JUSTO] Promoter Puspamitra Das Acquires 4,000 Equity Shares of Justo Realfintech Ltd Through Open Market
item.description:
Puspamitra Das, a promoter of Justo Realfintech Ltd, has acquired 4,000 equity shares of the company through the open market. The acquisition was made on 3rd February 2026. Before the acquisition, the promoter held 38.52% of the total share capital and voting rights. Post-acquisition, the holding has increased to 38.52%. The total equity share capital of the company remains at INR 18,79,81,420 consisting of 1,87,98,142 equity shares of Rs. 10 each.

  • Puspamitra Das, a promoter of Justo Realfintech Ltd, has acquired 4,000 equity shares of the company.
  • The acquisition was made through the open market on 3rd February 2026.
  • Before the acquisition, the promoter held 38.52% of the total share capital and voting rights.
  • Post-acquisition, the holding of the promoter has increased to 38.52%.
  • The total equity share capital of the company remains at INR 18,79,81,420 consisting of 1,87,98,142 equity shares of Rs. 10 each.

item.title: [CSL] Vachi Commercial LLP Acquires 7,00,000 Equity Shares of Continental Securities Limited via Preferential Allotment
item.description:
Vachi Commercial LLP, a Partner of Vachi Commercial LLP, has acquired 7,00,000 equity shares of Continental Securities Limited through a preferential allotment. This acquisition increases Vachi Commercial LLP's holding to 8.85% of the total share capital diluted. The equity shares have a face value of Rs. 2/- each and amount to Rs. 5,99,06,000/-. The acquisition was made on 31st January 2026.

item.title: [3IINFOTECH] 3i Infotech Ltd. Files Complaint Against eMudhra Limited for Large-Scale Financial Fraud
item.description:
3i Infotech Ltd. has filed a complaint with the Additional Commissioner of Police, Economic Offence Wing, Navi Mumbai Police Commissionerate, against eMudhra Limited (originally incorporated as 3i Infotech Consumer Services Limited) for a large-scale corporate financial fraud, criminal breach of trust, cheating, dishonest misappropriation, and criminal conspiracy. The fraud is estimated to have caused a loss of over Rupees 128 crores (Rupees One Hundred Twenty-Eight crores only) plus interest and damages to the listed entity from December 2010 to January 2021. The complaint also involves two individuals, Mr. Venkatraman Srinivasan and Mr. Ravi Jagannathan. 3i Infotech Ltd. is also in the process of submitting a complaint with the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI).

  • 3i Infotech Ltd. files complaint against eMudhra Limited for large-scale financial fraud
  • Fraud estimated to have caused a loss of over Rupees 128 crores plus interest and damages
  • Involvement of two individuals, Mr. Venkatraman Srinivasan and Mr. Ravi Jagannathan
  • Complaint filed with the Additional Commissioner of Police, Economic Offence Wing, Navi Mumbai Police Commissionerate
  • 3i Infotech Ltd. also in process of submitting a complaint with the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI)
